Interface TaskService

All Known Implementing Classes:

public interface TaskService
The interface Task service.

  • Method Details

    • create

      TaskDTO create(TaskRequest request) throws ParseException
      Creates a new task based on the provided TaskRequest object.
      Parameters:
      request - the TaskRequest object containing the task data.
      Returns:
      the created TaskDTO object.
      Throws:
      ParseException - if there is an error parsing the date in the TaskRequest object.

    • getTaskById

      TaskDTO getTaskById(Long id)
      Retrieves a task by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the task to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the TaskDTO object representing the retrieved task, or null if no task is found.

    • getTasks

      List<TaskDTO> getTasks()
      Retrieves a list of all tasks.
      Returns:
      the list of TaskDTO objects representing all tasks.

    • getMyTasks

      List<TaskDTO> getMyTasks()
      Retrieves a list of tasks assigned to the currently authenticated user.
      Returns:
      the list of TaskDTO objects representing the user's assigned tasks.

    • delete

      void delete(Long id)
      Deletes a task by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the task to delete.

    • update

      TaskDTO update(TaskRequest request) throws ParseException
      Updates an existing task based on the provided TaskRequest object.
      Parameters:
      request - the TaskRequest object containing the updated task data.
      Returns:
      the updated TaskDTO object.
      Throws:
      ParseException - if there is an error parsing the date in the TaskRequest object.

    • changeTaskState

      TaskDTO changeTaskState(TaskRequest request)
      Change task state task dto.
      Parameters:
      request - the request
      Returns:
      the task dto
